quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Wonder Years and Television
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, actor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What actress played Waynes high school girlfriend Delores on the hit television show “The Wonder Years”?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Juliette Lewis

questions.question: What was the name of the last episode in which Dr. Trapper John McIntyre appeared in the M*A*S*H series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Abyssinia, Henry

questions.question: Why did actor Wayne Rogers leave M*A*S*H and his character Trapper” John after only the third season of the show?

options.text: He needed more time with his family.
He had originally been offered equal billing to Hawkeye.
He had a better job offer.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He had originally been offered equal billing to Hawkeye.

questions.question: What year did the television comedy-drama show  The Wonder Years first hit the airwaves ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1988

questions.question: What was the name of the junior high school that Kevin and Paul attended on the great television show “The Wonder Years “?

options.text: Robert F. Kennedy Junior High School.
Martin Van Buren Junior High School

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert F. Kennedy Junior High School.

questions.question: In the M*A*S*H TV series, what did Trapper give to camp clerk Radar to give to Hawkeye in lieu of a goodbye letter because Hawkeye was away in Tokyo when Trapper left for home?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A kiss on the cheek

questions.question: Screech from the show “Saved By the Bell was also seen on the hit TV series “The Wonder Years.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Winnie started dating an 8th grader while Kevin was dating Becky Slater. What is the name of the 8th grader that Winnie was seeing on the show “The Wonder Years”?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kirk McCray

questions.question: What was the name of the theme song of the popular 80s television show “The Wonder Years”?

options.text: With a Little Help from My Friends

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: With a Little Help from My Friends

questions.question: David Schwimmer from the television show “Friends played Michael (Karen Arnolds boyfriend and later husband) on the hit television show The Wonder Years.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Wayne Rogers was sued by M*A*S*H producers for breach of contract for leaving the show.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who portrayed Jack Arnold (Kevin’s father) on the popular television show “The Wonder Years”?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dan Lauria

questions.question: The voice of Kevin Arnold as an adult was narrated every episode. The narrator would explain to the viewers about his growing up and his experiences in life. What actor provided the voice of Kevin Arnold on the show “The Wonder Years”?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Daniel Stern

questions.question: Three actors actually have played the part of Dr. Trapper John McIntyre in all the M*A*S*H TV and film adaptations.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Initially Wayne Rogers wanted to play not Trapper John but the Hawkeye character in the M*A*S*H series but he was turned down on that part.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Mamas Family and Television
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, harpers, harper. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: On what date did the show Mamas Family debut?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: January 22, 1983

questions.question: When Mamas Family first started, Vinton Harper had his two children living with him. His sons name was Buzz. What was his daughters name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sonia

questions.question: Mamas Family started as a skit in the Carol Burnett Show.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: On Mamas Family, Beverly Archer played the Harpers spinster neighbor who lived with her parents and had a crush on Vint. What was her name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Iola Boylan

questions.question: On the show Whats Happening!! the gang hung out at what diner?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robs Place

questions.question: Who played the role of Dee Thomas on the hit television show Whats Happening!!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Danielle Spencer

questions.question: The show Whats Happening!! was loosely based on which movie released in 1975?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cooley High

questions.question: What was Reruns last name on the show Whats Happening!!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stubbs

questions.question: The hit television show Whats Happening!! was on what television network in the 1970s?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ABC

questions.question: What year did the television show Whats Happening!! first hit the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1976

questions.question: Martin Lawrence starred in the hit sitcom Whats Happening Now!! in 1987.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What year did the show Whats Happening!! first leave the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1979

questions.question: On the show Whats Happening!!, what was Dwaynes last name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nelson

questions.question: What year did the comedy-drama show “The Wonder Years leave the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1993

questions.question: Who played Mama on the television show Whats Happening!!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mabel King

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Voice and Mamas Family
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, j.d. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What actor played Stanley Zbornak on the sitcom The Golden Girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Herb Edelman

questions.question: What was the first name of Major Burns wife on the show M*A*S*H?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Louise

questions.question: At the end of the movie Inspector Gadget Brain speaks and his voice is the same as in the cartoon series of the same name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What was Vints pet name for his wife on Mamas Family?

options.text: He didnt have a pet name for her

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Skeeter

questions.question: Don Adams, the voice of Inspector Gadget in the popular cartoon, played the leading character in what 1960s show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Get Smart

questions.question: On the Mama’s Family show, what April Fools trick did mama play on the others one year?

options.text: She tricked them into cleaning up the yard.
She tricked them into taking her out for supper.
She made a bet with them that she knew they would lose.
She tricked them into getting everything set up for a yard sale.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She tricked them into cleaning up the yard.

questions.question: What is the main course Boss J.D. Hogg always eats in the Dukes of Hazzard?

options.text: Chicken, salad, liver, pizza, and beer from the Boars Nest

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Raw beef liver

questions.question: Who was Lucas Hollingsworth played by when Dorothy married him in The Golden Girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leslie Nielsen

questions.question: Hy Averback was the voice over the loudspeaker heard on the TV show M*A*S*H.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the movie The Dukes of Hazzard, what type of car was the General Lee?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1969 Dodge Charger

questions.question: What was the name of the womans group that Thelma and Iola belonged to on the show Mama’s Family?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Church Ladies League

questions.question: Was the show Saved By The Bell ever called Good Morning Miss Bliss?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Who plays Capt. B.J. Hunnicut in the TV series M*A*S*H?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mike Farrell

questions.question: Bubba was Thelmas son on the show Mamas Family.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Did Vinton and Naomi have any children together on the Mamas Family show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Kojak and Series
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, field. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What was the name of the 1973 TV movie that made the character of Kojak popular and ultimately led to the TV series Kojak ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Marcus Nelson Murders

questions.question: Television detective Lt. Kojak is famous for practising this habit, which became his trademark.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sucking on lollipops

questions.question: Frank Burns was a character on M*A*S*H for how many seasons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 5

questions.question: This actor, who was often called Demosthenes, played the part of detective Stavros, one of the working partners of Lt. Kojak, on the 1970s TV series, Kojak.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Savalas

questions.question: What kind of pet did Major Burns from M*A*S*H own when he was a child?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Canary

questions.question: In which precinct of the Manhattan South district did the tough and incorruptible 1970s TV detective, Lt. Kojak work?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 13th precinct

questions.question: What 1970s Kojak actor portrayed Captain Frank McNeil, who initially was Kojaks partner, but later worked his way up the system and became chief of detectives?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dan Frazer

questions.question: What field of medicine did Frank Burns specialize in the M*A*S*H series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Podiatry

questions.question: In the animated show Pinky and the Brain by Warner Bros, what company splices the genes that make lab mice Pinky and the Brain so special?

options.text: You Dice Em We Splice Em, Inc.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Acme Labs

questions.question: This actor, who participated in the prime-time soap opera Knots Landing,  portrayed the character of Kojaks partner, Detective Bobby Crocker, on CBS series, Kojak.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kevin Dobson

questions.question: What actor played the role of Detective Rizzo from 1974 to 1977 on US detective TV series, Kojak?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vince Conti

questions.question: TV series Kojak, which ran between 1973 and 1978 on CBS, was set in what major city?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New York

questions.question: What is Major Frank Burns home state in the M*A*S*H series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Indiana

questions.question: In the TV series M*A*S*H, what did Frank leave to Margaret in his will?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His Clothes

questions.question: In March 2005, a remake of the Kojak series debuted on the USA Network. This time, the main character is portrayed by an African-American actor.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Brain and Pinky
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, pinky. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Every episode of Pinky and the Brain ends with the Brain asking one and the same question: Pinky, are you pondering what Im pondering? and Pinky giving a completely irrelevant answer. Which of these was the first answer to this memorable question?

options.text: Id say, Whoof, the odds of that happening are terribly small, Brain.
I think so, Brain, but where are we going to find a duck and a hose at this hour?
Certainly Brain, Narf, but where do we find a tattoo parlor and a box of corn flakes at this time of night?
I think so, Brain, but why would a turkey go to a tattoo parlor, Narf?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I think so, Brain, but where are we going to find a duck and a hose at this hour?

questions.question: In Saved by the Bell, when Zack hurt his knee and had to have surgery, which sport was he playing?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Basketball

questions.question: Before having a show of their own, Pinky and the Brain appeared in which popular animated TV series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Animaniacs

questions.question: In the Saved by the Bell series, Screech discovers a cream that makes acne disappear. What happens when Kelly gets a zit right before homecoming and uses the cream?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Her face turns maroon.

questions.question: This famous movie director, known to be a big fan of animated cartoons, was the executive producer of Pinky and the Brain.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steven Spielberg

questions.question: What is the name of Slaters little sister on the American teen sitcom Saved by the Bell?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: J.B.

questions.question: What was the name of the teacher who taught Drivers Education in the Saved by the Bell series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Tuttle

questions.question: The Pinky and the Brain show featured many different writers, but there were only two main staff writers. Name them.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alex Boorstein and Tom Sheppard

questions.question: Which of these voice actors is not among the many, who lent their voices to the different characters in Pinky and the Brain?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jim Carrey

questions.question: In an episode of Saved by the Bell, Zack convinces Jesse, Kelly and Lisa to start a signing group. What name does he give them?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hot Sundae

questions.question: Which actor voices the animated albino lab mouse Pinky, that is just like the Brain, but appears to be substantially less bright?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rob Paulsen

questions.question: The Brain, the more intelligent character of the animated duo, speaks and acts coldly, in a deadpan manner, and never shows any kind of emotion.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In an episode of the Saved by the Bell series, Zach decides he wants to be remembered not as a trouble maker but as a good guy, so he tries rewrite the school song and win the contest. What does he name his song?

options.text: School is where the heart is

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cool School

questions.question: The animated adventures of Pinky and the Brain aired on the WB Television Network from 1995 to 1998, and were created by what two men?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Ruegger and Peter Hastings

questions.question: In Pinky and the Brain, which actor gave his voice to the Brain, Pinkys highly intelligent cagemate, who is constantly contemplating a plan for world domination?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maurice LaMarche

questions.question: I was a college student working as a babysitter for three kids in New Brunswick, New Jersey. What TV show was I on?

questions.question: In an episode of the show Saved by the Bell, Zack falls for a homeless girl who works at the mall. What is her name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Laura

questions.question: On this show the father was a prejudiced bigot who disliked his son-in-law and the mother was an understanding woman named Edith.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All in the Family

questions.question: What was the name of the beach club at which the gang from Saved by the Bell worked during the summer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Malibu Sands Beach Resort

questions.question: What is Valleys mascot in the Saved by the Bell series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bulldog

questions.question: We lived in the hills until we got rich, then we moved to Beverly Hills. What TV show were we on?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Beverly Hillbillies

questions.question: In Saved by the Bell, what was the Indian name given to Zack by Chief Henry?

questions.question: On this sitcom the wife had 3 daughters and the husband had 3 sons.

questions.question: In the Saved by the Bell series, what is the name of the sleazy jeweler Zack gets the class rings from?

questions.question: When Lisa from the Saved by the Bell series becomes Homecoming queen, the gang all attend a toga party and Zack crashes Lisas moms car. What happens to Slater during the crash?

questions.question: In Saved by the Bell, what score did Zack have on his SAT’s?

questions.question: I named my kid Opie. I was a sheriff and my Deputy was called Barnie Fife. What TV show was I on?

questions.question: What is the theme for the gangs senior prom in the sitcom Saved by the Bell?

questions.question: What is Lisas mothers profession in the Saved by the Bell series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Doctor

questions.question: I am famous as the little boy who always got in trouble and I had a neighbour, Mr Wilson who despised me. What TV show was I on?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dennis the Menace
